div.head: CHAP. XXV.
1 Dauids confidence in prayer. 7 Hee prayeth for remission of sinnes, 16 and for helpe in affliction.
div.ab: [A Psalme of Dauid.] Vnto thee, O Lord, doe I lift vp my soule.
O my God, I trust in thee, let me not be ashamed: let not mine enemies triumph ouer me. Psal.22.5. & 31.2. & 34 9.
Yea let none that waite on thee, be ashamed: let them bee ashamed which transgresse without cause. Esa.28.16 Rom.10.11
Shewe mee thy wayes, O Lord: teach me thy pathes. Psa.27.11 & 86.11. & 119.
Lead me in thy trueth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my saluation, on thee doe I waite all the day.
Remember, O Lord, thy tender mercies, and thy louing kindnesses: for they haue beene euer of old. Psal.103. 17. & . 106. 1. & 107. 1. Iere.33.3. , Heb. thy bowels.
Remember not the sinnes of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercie remember thou me, for thy goodnesse sake, O Lord.
Good and vpright is the Lord: therefore will hee teach sinners in the way.
The meeke will he guide in iudgement: and the meeke will he teach his way.
All the pathes of the Lord are mercy and truth: vnto such as keepe his couenant, and his testimonies.
For thy names sake, O Lord, pardon mine iniquitie: for it is great.
What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall chuse.
His soule shall dwell at ease: and his seede shall inherite the earth. Heb. shall lodge in goodnesse.
The secret of the Lord is with them that feare him: and he will shew them his couenant. Pro.3. 32. , Or, and his couenant to make them know it.
Mine eyes are euer towards the Lord: for hee shall plucke my feete out of the net. Heb. bring foorth.
Turne thee vnto me, and haue mercy vpon me: for I am desolate and afflicted.
The troubles of my heart are inlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
Looke vpon mine affliction, aud my paine, and forgiue all my sinnes.
Consider mine enemies: for they are many, and they hate me with cruell hatred. Heb. hatred of violence.
O keepe my soule and deliuer me: let me not bee ashamed, for I put my trust in thee.
Let integritie and vprightnesse preserue me: for I wait on thee.
Redeeme Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
